--- In gladiator@y..., laughingmadman@h... wrote:
> i need help. i'm on the stage with Carl the druid, and i've beeten 
> the garden, and the training grounds, and i can't find out where to 
> go from there, and don't say use the cheat keys, cause i'm not going 
> to.

What character(s) are you using?  If you can raise a ghost, you can 
generally find the exit, given enough time.  Or if you have a mage, 
you can eventually access the whole map.  Also, exits are generally 
visible on the grid.
